description: This file defines a Flutter widget for creating a new event via a form, including UI components, state management, and interaction logic.

classes.name: EventFormPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget providing a form interface for creating new in-memory events.

classes.name: _EventFormPageState
classes.description: State class handling the form logic, validations, and UI updates for EventFormPage.

methods.name: _pickDateTime
methods.description: Asynchronously opens date and time pickers, updates the selected DateTime, and schedules UI refresh.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates form, creates an Event object, adds it via provider, and navigates back.
